flawed_nl_solution:
The left-hand mice cost 120*0.3=$<<120*0.3=36>>36 more than right-handed ones
So they cost 120+36=$<<120+36=165>>165
So he makes 165*25=$<<165*25=4125>>4125 a day
The store is open 7-3=<<7-3=4>>4 days a week
So in a week, he makes 4125*4=$<<4125*4=16500>>16500
#### 16500

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 156, not 165. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
